contents:
西方網絡社區裡面「扣帽子」（labeling, generalization, stereotyping）一般是允許的。人身攻擊如果不帶謾罵性質也是允許的。只是西方混跡這些社區的人一般都臉皮比較厚，不會說被人扣了帽子就跳了。

另外，「扣帽子」本身就是一種虛弱和無效的辯論方式。比如一個人說“It's the white men with guns that cause all the problems in California”，我假如回應“You are such a delusional gun grabber (扣了帽子) and therefore anything you said we need not take seriously”，這本身是十分虛弱和無效的。

假如我說舉事實論證的話：“The majority of armed perps are African Californians and the majority of shooting victims are also African Californians. White Californians are overwhelmingly law-abiding, and yet you are pointing all the 'gun' violence at whites. Ignoring African Californians' need of self-defense and better education, while advocating disarming the law-abiding citizens makes no sense.”這樣才是有效的論證。

在中國，情況有些不同。「五毛」和「粉蛆」，由於與中共犯罪黨有關，是十分嚴重的帽子。做「五毛」或「粉蛆」本身就可以在品蔥被封禁。因此，扣「五毛」和「粉蛆」這兩樣帽子確實應該舉出充分論據。
